            <div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif">Impact
of the credit environment on the Group&#8217;s financial position and results of
operations</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The following table
provides an overview of the Group&#8217;s net exposures to credit market activities,
predominantly held by the RBS acquired businesses.</font></div>

    millions</font></font></div>
                      </td>
                      <td valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                      <td colspan="2" nowrap valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">

      June </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">2009</font></div>
                      </td>
                      <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                      <td valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                      <td align="left" valign="bottom">
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Net exposure </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super">1</font></font></div>

                      <td valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

                      <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="78%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                      <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                      <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                      <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td align="left" colspan="8" valign="bottom">
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
                        </div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">1 Net exposure
      is the carrying value after taking account of hedge protection purchased
      from monolines and other counterparties. The hedge provides protection
      against the notional and interest cash flows due to the holder of debt
      instruments in the event of default by the debt security
      counterparty.</font></div>
                      </td>
                      <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    </tr>
                </table>
              </div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The Group&#8217;s total
net exposure to asset-backed securities (&#8216;ABS&#8216;) of EUR 24 billion at 30 June
2009 has decreased by 15% during the first half of 2009 mainly as a result of
transfers to RBS and maturing of certain positions. EUR 21.0 billion of the
total net exposure to ABS relates to the Group&#8217;s holding of residential
mortgage-backed securities (&#8216;RMBS&#8216;) which includes mortgage covered bonds (EUR
10.1 billion) and securities backed by mortgages covered by the Dutch mortgage
guarantee scheme (EUR 7.9 billion). 30% of the total exposure to ABS was
originated in 2007, 38% in 2006 and a further 20% in 2005.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">During the first
half of 2009 the net exposure to monoline insurers decreased significantly due
to increased credit valuation adjustment (&#8216;CVA&#8217;) levels, novations to RBS and an
overlay swap transacted with RBS which transfers the daily movement in the CVA
to RBS for a number of selected trades. The mark-to-market of this swap with RBS
was EUR 35 million in favour of ABN AMRO at 30 June 2009.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The reduction in
the net exposure to Credit Derivative Product Companies (&#8216;CDPCs&#8217;) reflects trade
novations to RBS.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">At 30 June 2009 the
total syndication and leveraged loan portfolio has either been sold or is now
kept and managed as an integral part of the loan book.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                <div id="FTR">
                  <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
                  <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Page
13 of 38</font></div>
                  <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                    <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
                  </div>

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">UNAUDITED</font></font></div><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 16pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 16pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Condensed
Consolidated Financial Statements</font></font></div>

                      <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="78%">
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Cash and balances at central
      banks</font></font></div>
                      </td>
                      <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                      <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                      <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                    <tr>
                      <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="78%">

                      </td>
                      <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                      <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">)</font></td>

                      <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Numbers
stated against items refer to the notes.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

                  <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">

                <div id="HDR">
                  <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">

                </div>
              </div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">UNAUDITED</font></font></div><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Notes to the condensed consolidated
financial statements</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Basis of preparation and
presentation</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN AMRO Holding N.V. (referred to as
&#8216;the Group&#8217;, &#8216;ABN AMRO&#8217; or &#8216;ABN AMRO Group&#8217;) condensed consolidated financial
statements for the six months ended 30 June 2009 are presented in accordance
with International Accounting Standard 34 </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000; FONT-STYLE: italic">Interim Financial
Reporting.</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The condensed consolidated financial
statements do not include all the information and disclosures required in the
annual financial statements and should be read in conjunction with the Group&#8217;s
audited financial statements as part of the Annual Report as at 31 December
2008, which was prepared in accordance with International Financial Reporting
Standards (&#8216;IFRS&#8217;) as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board
(&#8216;IASB&#8217;) and </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">IFRS as
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">adopted by the European
Union (&#8216;EU&#8217;).</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The condensed consolidated financial
statements are unaudited. In the opinion of management, all disclosures
necessary for an understanding in the changes in financial position and
performance of ABN AMRO since the end of the last annual reporting period have
been made. </font>In some instances presentation of comparative amounts has been
amended to align with the current presentation. In addition, certain balances
within cash flows from financing activities have been reclassified for the
comparative period in these condensed consolidated financial statements. This
does not impact the net cash flows from financing activities for the comparative
period.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Unless otherwise stated, all amounts are
stated in millions of euros.</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Changes
in accounting policies</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The same accounting
policies and methods of computation are followed in these condensed consolidated
financial statements as were applied in the preparation of the Group&#8217;s financial
statements for the year ended 31 December 2008, except, where applicable, for
the impact for the adoption of the Standards and interpretations described
below.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">IAS 1 (revised
2007) Presentation of Financial Statements</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">(effective for
annual periods beginning on or after 1 January 2009)</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The revised IAS 1 affects the
presentation of owner changes in equity and of comprehensive income. Information
is to be aggregated based on shared characteristics, specifically requiring
disclosure of changes in equity arising from transactions with owners separate
from other changes in equity. The Standard requires the entity to present all
items of recognised income and expense including gains and losses either in one
single statement or in two linked statements. In order to implement the revised
IAS 1, ABN AMRO presents two statements, a separate income statement displaying
components of profit or loss and a second statement, the statement of
comprehensive income, which begins with profit or loss and displays components
of other comprehensive income. The &#8216;owner&#8217; changes in equity remain in the
statement of changes in equity.</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">In addition to this, the Standard has
introduced a number of terminology changes, including revised titles for the
financial statements. ABN AMRO has renamed the balance sheet to &#8216;statement of
financial position&#8217; and the cash flow statement to &#8216;statement of cash flows&#8217;.
</font>Adoption of the revised Standard has had no impact on the reported
results or financial position of the Group.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Adoption of
amendments to the following Standards and Interpretations applicable to this
accounting period did not have an impact on the accounting policies, financial
position or performance of the Group:</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">IAS 23 Borrowing costs,
IAS 32 Financial instruments, Presentation and IAS 1 Puttable Financial
Instruments and Obligations arising on liquidation, IFRS 2 Share based payments,
IFRIC 13 Customer Loyalty Programmes, IFRIC 15 Agreements for the Construction
of Real Estate,</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000"> IFRIC 16 Hedges of a
Net Investment in a Foreign Operation and Improvements to IFRS issued in May
2008.</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
              <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                <div id="FTR">
                  <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
                  <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Page
19 of 38</font></div>
                  <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                    <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div id="HDR">
                  <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div>
                  <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">UNAUDITED</font></font></div>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Segment
reporting</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN AMRO is comprised of three
reportable segments, namely &#8220;RBS acquired&#8221;, &#8220;Dutch State acquired&#8221; and &#8220;Central
Items&#8221;. The &#8220;RBS acquired&#8221; segment principally contains the international
lending</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">,</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> international transaction services with
operations in Europe, Asia and the Americas</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and the equities business of the RBS
Group. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The &#8220;Dutch State
acquired&#8221; segment serves Dutch commercial clients, Dutch consumer clients, and
Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and
international</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> private
clients</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, and includes
t</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">he International Diamond
and Jewelry </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">business</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">. The &#8220;Central Items&#8221; segment includes
items that are not allocated to but economically shared by the Consortium
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">M</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">embers as well as settlement amounts
accruing to Banco Santander S.A.</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">In prior periods the Group disclosed six
reportable segments, namely Europe, Americas, Asia, the Netherlands, Private
Clients and Central Items. The change from six reportable segments to three
reportable segments reflects the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">focus of the Managing Board on the
creation and subsequent </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">legal separation of the Dutch
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">State </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">acquired businesses from the residual
RBS acquired businesses into two separate </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">independent </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">banks, and the consequential impact that
this progression has had on the management of the Group. Comparative segment
figures have been restated to reflect the current organisation
structure.</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Measurement of segment assets,
liabilities, income and results is based on the Group&#8217;s accounting policies.
Segment assets, liabilities, income and results include items directly
attributable to a segment.</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">In addition certain items previously
reported as Central Items have been reallocated to either RBS acquired or Dutch
State acquired. Comparative </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">segment </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">information for 2008 ha</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">s also</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> been adjusted</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">to reflect these </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">limited </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">changes</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">.</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Central Items</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> as noted</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> include</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">s</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> items that are not allocated to but
economically shared by the Consortium </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">M</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">embers, as well as accumulated amounts
accruing to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Banco Santander
S.A</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">arising from the disposal of
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Banco Real</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and other sales and
settlements.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">I</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">n addition prior to</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> April 2008, the majority of the Group
Asset and Liability Management portfolios</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">were economically</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> shared prior to</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> allocat</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ion</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> to the respective Consortium Members.
Since the allocation was effected on the basis of prospective agreements between
Consortium Members, Group Asset and Liability Management results prior to this
date are reported in Central Items. Remaining unallocated Group Asset and
Liability Management portfolios continue to be reported in Central
Items.</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Operating segment information for the
six months ended 30 June 2009</font></font></div>

                    </tr>
                </table>
              </div>

profit from continuing operations for the first half year of 2009 is 21.3% (six
months ended 30 June 2008: 24.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">1</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">%) compared to a nominal tax rate in the

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">16&#160;&#160;&#160;Goodwill</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">As of 30 June 2009, EUR 194 million of
goodwill has been fully impaired. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The goodwill impairment
charge</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> relates to
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">disposal </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">units </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">comprising </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">the Group's retail
and commercial businesses across Asia and the wholesale banking businesses in
Vietnam, Philippines, Taiwan and Pakistan</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> which are </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">classified as held for sale</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> The recoverable amounts for the
impairment purposes have been determined based on the agreed and expected sale
prices of these disposal units.</font></font></div>

            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Bonds and notes are issued in the
capital markets with a focus on the euro market and are denominated mostly in
Euros and US dollars. The commercial paper programmes are issued
globally.</font></font></div>

structured liabilities that have been designated at fair value through income of
EUR 33,869 million (2008: EUR 36,856 million). </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The change in fair value attributable to

            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">UNAUDITED</font><br></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">25&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Subordinated
liabilities</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Issued liabilities
qualify as subordinated debt if claims by the holders are subordinated to all
other current and future liabilities of, respectively, ABN&#160;AMRO Holding
N.V., ABN&#160;AMRO Bank&#160;N.V. and other Group companies. These liabilities
qualify as capital, taking into account remaining maturities, for the purpose of
determining the consolidated capital adequacy ratios for the Dutch Central
Bank.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The following table
analyses the subordinated liabilities by issuer:</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
            <div align="left">
              <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                  <tr>
                    <td valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" colspan="2" nowrap valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">30 June </font></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">2009</font></font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" colspan="2" nowrap valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">31 December
      2008</font></font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  </tr>
                  <tr>

            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Total subordinated
liabilities include EUR 3,309 million (2008: EUR 3,317 million) which qualifies
as tier 1 capital for capital adequacy purposes with the Dutch Central Bank,
when taking into account remaining maturities.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>

                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

liabilities are designated at fair value through income. The change in fair
value attributable to changes in own credit risk is as follows:</font></div>

            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">26</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Note to the statement of cash
flows</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Net
cash flows from financing activities</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">All repayments on
subordinated liabilities are due to maturing of the securities. Repayment and
repurchase of other long term funding consists of EUR 0.9 billion repurchase and
EUR 7.9 billion repayment on maturity.&#160;&#160;Issuance of equity funding is
due to EUR 3.0 billion share premium increase by RFS Holdings B.V.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Currency
translation differences on cash and cash equivalents</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The adverse
currency translation differences on cash and cash equivalents are mainly due to
the effect of the appreciation of the British Pound against the
Euro.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
            <div>
              <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                <div id="FTR">
                  <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
                </div>
                <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
                  <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Page
28 of 38</font></div>
                  <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                    <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div id="HDR">
                  <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">UNAUDITED</font></font><br><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">27</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Capital adequacy</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Subsequent to its
acquisition by RFS Holdings B.V., ABN AMRO received approval for a transitional
period from the Dutch Central Bank and the UK Financial Services Authority with
regards to compliance to Basel II capital rules. ABN AMRO has agreed with these
regulators to continue to report figures on the basis of Basel I until December
2009. In accordance with this, specific minimal requirements have been set for
Tier 1 and Total capital ratios, including the requirement to treat the capital
deductions in the same manner as required by Basel II.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">These ratios
measure capital adequacy by comparing the Group&#8217;s eligible capital with its
balance sheet assets, off-balance sheet commitments and market and other risk
positions at weighted amounts to reflect their relative risk. The market risk
approach covers the general market risk and the risk of open positions in
currencies and debt and equity securities primarily in the trading book. Assets
are weighted according to broad categories of notional risk, being assigned a
risk weighting according to the amount of capital deemed to be necessary to
support them.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Tier 1 capital
consists of shareholders&#8217; equity and qualifying subordinated liabilities less
goodwill and some intangible assets. The total capital ratio includes additional
qualifying subordinated liabilities, taking into account the remaining
maturities (tier 2 capital). Core tier 1 capital is tier 1 capital excluding
qualifying subordinated liabilities.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The following table
provides actual capital levels as determined for supervisory
purposes:</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div align="left">
              <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                  <tr>
                    <td valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                    <td valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td colspan="6" nowrap valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
                      </div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">30 June
2009</font></font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                    <td valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;

                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td colspan="2" valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

                  </tr>
                  <tr>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Total
      risk-weighted assets</font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td colspan="2" valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">150,877</font></td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

            </div>
            <div align="left">&#160;</div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">28&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Profit
from discontinued operations net of tax / Assets and liabilities of businesses
held for sale</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">At 31 December 2008 and 30 June 2009,
the assets and liabilities of the private equity investments not allocated to
individual </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">C</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">onsortium </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">M</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">embers as well as remaining Santander
businesses were classified as disposal groups.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">In addition, at 30 June 2009, disposal
groups comprise the assets and liabilities of the Group's retail and commercial
businesses across Asia and the wholesale banking businesses in Vietnam,
Philippines, Taiwan and Pakistan. On 4 August 2009, the RBS Group announced that
it had agreed to sell retail and commercial banking operations in Taiwan, Hong
Kong, Singapore and Indonesia together with its onshore wholesale operations in
the Philippines, Vietnam and Taiwan to ANZ Group Limited, which are held by ABN
AMRO.&#160;&#160;Additionally, on 12 August 2009 RBS announced that it had
agreed to sell its 99.37% holding in The Royal Bank of Scotland Limited
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">(RBS Pakistan) to
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">MCB
Bank Limited.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">29&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Subsequent
events</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Capital actions</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">On 26 June 2009, the Minister of Finance
of the Netherlands (</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#8216;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">the Minister</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#8217;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">) as part of an update letter to the
Dutch Lower House of Parliament on the strategy, risk policy, legal structure
and the separation plan, requested approval for specific capitalisation actions.
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">In July 2009 the Dutch
Parliament approved the Minister&#8217;s request to acquire a EUR 800 million
Mandatory Convertible Tier-1 Security (</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#8216;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">MCS</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#8217;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">) to be issued by ABN AMRO Bank N.V. and
enter into a Credit Default Swap (</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#8216;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">CDS</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#8217;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">) agreement with ABN AMRO Bank
N.V.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
            <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
              <div id="FTR">
                <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
                </div>
              </div>
              <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
                <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Page
29 of 38</font></div>
                <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                  <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
                </div>
              </div>
              <div id="HDR">
                <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
              <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">UNAUDITED</font></font></div>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left"><br><br><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The MCS has been issued and was acquired
by the Ministry of Finance on 31 July 2009. When ABN AMRO II N.V. transfers out
of ABN AMRO Holding N.V., planned by the end of 2009, the security will
mandatorily convert into common equity of ABN AMRO II N.V.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#160;&#160;The MCS pays a 10% coupon
and ABN AMRO Bank N.V. may defer coupons at any time.&#160;&#160;In case ABN
AMRO Bank N.V. is in breach of minimum capital adequacy requirements, as set by
the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Dutch Central
Bank</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, the coupon payments
will be deferred mandatorily.</font></font></div>
            </div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">Furthermore, the CDS agreement
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">was</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f"> signed on 31 July 2009 with a start
date of no later than 31 August 2009.&#160;&#160;Through this arrangement ABN
AMRO Bank N.V. will purchase credit protection, for a fee of 51.5</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">bps p.a. on the outstanding portfolio
amount, currently EUR 34.5 billion portfolio of own originated residential
mortgages.&#160;&#160;Under the agreement losses will be shared pari passu
between ABN AMRO Bank N.V. for 5% and Dutch State for 95%, with a first loss for
ABN AMRO Bank N.V. of 20bps p.a.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">&#160;&#160;This credit default swap
will reduce the risk-weighted assets of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. by EUR 19
billion.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Capital repatriation</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">On 7 August 2009 approval from the
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">Dutch Central
Bank</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f"> was sought on the
distribution of EUR 6.5 billion from ABN AMRO Bank N.V. to ABN AMRO Holding N.V.
to enable ABN AMRO Holding N.V. to pay a dividend of EUR 6.5 billion to RFS
Holdings B.V. for capital repatriation to its shareholder Santander, relating to
realised proceeds from the 2008 sale of the Santander acquired businesses. Any
further distribution for the benefit of Consortium </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">M</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">embers will be subject to separate
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">Dutch Central
Bank</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f"> approval and will be
carried out upon the completion of planned capital actions.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Disposal of
businesses</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #00201f; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">We refer to note 28.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">30&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Related
parties</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The UK Government through HM Treasury is
the majority shareholder of The Royal Bank of Scotland Group plc, the ultimate
consolidating parent of ABN AMRO. The Dutch State is one of the shareholders of
ABN AMRO&#8217;s parent company, RFS Holdings B.V. As a result both the UK Government
and the Dutch State are related parties of ABN AMRO Group. The Group enters into
transactions with these and other related parties on an arms' length
basis.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Related party transactions in the six
months ended 30 June 2009 were similar in nature to those for the year ended 31
December 2008. Full details of the Group&#8217;s related party transactions for the
year ended 31 December 2008 are included in the Group&#8217;s 2008 Annual
Report.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">31&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Other
contingencies</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO is
involved in a number of legal proceedings in the ordinary course of our business
in a number of jurisdictions. In presenting our condensed consolidated financial
statements, management makes estimates regarding the outcome of legal,
regulatory and arbitration matters, and takes a charge to income when losses
with respect to such matters are probable. Charges, other than those taken
periodically for costs of defense, are not established for matters where losses
can not be reasonably estimated. On the basis of information currently
available, and having taken legal council with legal advisors, the Group is of
the opinion that the outcome of these proceedings is unlikely to have a material
adverse effect on the consolidated financial position and the consolidated
profit of the Group.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">In July 2004, ABN AMRO signed a written
agreement with the United States regulatory authorities concerning ABN AMRO&#8217;s
dollar clearing activities in the New York branch. In addition, in December
2005, ABN AMRO agreed to a Cease and Desist Order with the Dutch Central Bank
and various United States federal and state regulators. This involved an
agreement to pay an aggregate civil penalty of USD 75 million and a voluntary
endowment of USD 5 million in connection with deficiencies in the United States
dollar clearing operations at ABN AMRO&#8217;s New York branch and the United States
Department of Treasury compliance procedures regarding transactions originating
at its Dubai branch. ABN AMRO and members of ABN AMRO&#8217;s management continue to
provide information to law enforcement authorities in connection with ongoing
criminal investigations relating to ABN AMRO&#8217;s dollar clearing activities,
United States Department of Treasury compliance procedures and other Bank
Secrecy Act of 1970 compliance matters. The Cease and Desist Order with the
Dutch Central Bank was lifted on 26 July 2007 and the Cease and Desist Order
agreed with the United States authorities was lifted on 9 September 2008.
Although no written agreement has yet been reached and negotiations are ongoing,
ABN </font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
            <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
              <div id="FTR">
                <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
                </div>
              </div>
              <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
                <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Page
30 of 38</font></div>
                <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                  <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
                </div>
              </div>
              <div id="HDR">
                <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
              <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">UNAUDITED</font></font></div>
              <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><br>&#160;</div>
            </div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">AMRO has reached an agreement in
principle with the United States Department of Justice that would resolve all
presently known aspects of the ongoing investigation. Under the terms of the
agreement in principle, ABN AMRO and the United States would enter into a
deferred prosecution agreement in which ABN AMRO would waive indictment and
agree to the filing of information in the United States District Court charging
it with certain violations of federal law based on information disclosed in an
agreed factual statement. ABN AMRO would also agree to continue co-operating in
the United States&#8217; ongoing investigation and to settle all known civil and
criminal claims currently held by the United States for the sum of USD 500
million. The precise terms of the deferred prosecution agreement are still under
negotiation.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">These compliance issues and the related
sanctions and investigations have had, and will continue to have an impact on
ABN AMRO&#8217;s operations in the United States, including limitations on expansion.
ABN AMRO is actively exploring all possible options to resolve these issues. The
ultimate resolution of these compliance issues and related investigations and
the nature and severity of possible additional sanctions cannot be
predicted.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">32&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Condensed
consolidating financial statements</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN AMRO Bank N.V. is a wholly owned
subsidiary of ABN AMRO Group and is able to offer and sell certain securities in
the US from time to time pursuant to a registration statement on Form F-3 filed
with the SEC. The Group has fully and unconditionally guaranteed the obligations
of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. that have been incurred: this guarantee includes all
securities issued by ABN AMRO Bank N.V.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN AMRO Bank N.V. utilises an exception
in Rule 3-10 of Regulation S-X and therefore does not file its financial
statements with the SEC. In accordance with the requirement to qualify for the
exception, presented below is condensed consolidating financial information for
(i) ABN AMRO Holding N.V., on a standalone basis as guarantor ('Holding
Company'); (ii) ABN AMRO Bank N.V. on a standalone basis</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">('Bank Company'); (iii) other
subsidiaries of the Group on a combined basis ('Subsidiaries'); (iv)
consolidation adjustments ('</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Eliminate and reclassify</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">'); and total consolidated amounts ('ABN
AMRO consolidated').</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The condensed consolidated financial
information is prepared in accordance with International Financial Reporting
Standards (IFRS) as adopted by the EU and IFRS as issued by the IASB, where the
Group has applied Rule 3-10 of Regulation S-X which requires a company to
account for its investments in subsidiaries using the equity method, differing
from IAS 27 which requires the Group account for investments in their
subsidiaries at cost subject to impairment.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The following
consolidating information presents condensed statements of financial position as
at 30 June 2009 and 31 December 2008 and condensed statements of income and cash
flows for the six months ended 30 June 2009 and 2008 of Holding Company, Bank
Company and its subsidiaries.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The condensed
statements of financial position at 30 June 2009 and as at 31 December 2008 are
presented in the following tables:</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
            <div>
              <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

                  <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Condensed

                    <td valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  </tr>
                  <tr>
                    <td colspan="24" valign="bottom">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: arial">1
      Net exposure is the carrying value after taking account of hedge
      protection purchased from monolines and other counterparties. The hedge
      provides protection against the notional and interest&#160;cash flows due
      to the holder of debt instruments in the event of default by the debt
      security counterparty.</font></div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: arial">2
      Carrying value is the amount recorded on the balance
sheet.</font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  </tr>
              </table>
            </div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The Group&#8217;s
position in RMBS has slightly decreased in the first half of 2009. The held for
trading position consists of prime European RMBS positions held as part of the
RBS allocated Group Asset and Liability Management portfolios. The
available-for-sale RMBS positions are backed by mortgages covered by the Dutch
mortgage guarantee scheme and were AAA rated at 30 June 2009.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">96% of residential
mortgage covered bonds were AAA rated at 30 June 2009. All residential mortgage
covered bonds were originated in Europe, of which 79% in Spain.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The commercial
mortgage-backed securities (&#8216;CMBS&#8216;) position is now fully hedged and was
originated in Europe.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The collateralised
debt obligations (&#8216;CDO&#8216;) / collateralised loan obligations (&#8216;CLO&#8216;) exposure
decreased significantly due to transfers to RBS during the first half of 2009.
As part of the transfer, all super senior CDO positions (31 December 2008: EUR
636 million) were sold to RBS. A loss of EUR 203 million was recognised on those
positions in 2009 prior to the transfer. The remaining available-for-sale
portfolio comprises of other senior CDOs (EUR 270 million), which are held in
RBS allocated Group Asset and Liability Management portfolios and were AAA rated
at 30 June 2009.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The net exposure to
ABSs backed by assets other than residential mortgages, such as sovereign or
public entities debt, amounts to EUR 2.7 billion (31 December 2008: EUR 3.6
billion) and is mainly related to AAA European (41% Germany, 38% Spain) covered
bonds held in RBS allocated Group Asset and Liability Management portfolios. The
decrease is due to maturing of the papers, transfers to RBS, sale of part of the
portfolio and a decrease in fair value.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
            <div>

</font></div>
                </div>

exposure</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The table below

                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="78%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">

                    </td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
