                  <tr>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="78%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Net
      exposure to monolines</font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">2</font></td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">2,173</font></td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  </tr>
              </table>
            </div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The net loss
through income in the first half of 2009 amounts to EUR 1.4 billion and relates
to increased levels of CVA recorded against the exposures to monoline insurers
(mainly against MBIA and Assured Guaranty).</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The monoline
insurer CVA is calculated on a trade-by-trade basis, and is derived using market
observable monoline credit spreads. The perceived deterioration in the credit
quality of the monolines has been reflected by ratings downgrades. Market
observable credit spreads have widened with lower recovery rate assumptions and
this has resulted in relatively increased levels of CVA being recorded against
the exposures to these counterparties.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Of the EUR </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">947</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> million </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">hedges with bank counterparties
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">EUR </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">865</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> million</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> is subject to</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> an overlay swap transacted with RBS
which transfer</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">s</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> the daily movement in the credit
valuation adjustment (&#8220;CVA&#8221;) to RBS for these trades. The mark-to-market of this
swap with RBS was EUR 35 million in favour of ABN AMRO at 30 June
2009.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Credit
derivative product companies exposure</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -4.45pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The table below
presents a comparison of the mark-to-market of the credit protection purchased
and the CVA on the CDPC. The rating is based on the rating of the
CDPC:</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div align="left">
              <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                  <tr>
                    <td valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(in
      millions of euros)</font></div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    </td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" colspan="10" valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">30
      June 2009</font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="right" colspan="10" valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">

            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -4.45pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The decrease in the
notional amount and the related CVA during the first half of 2009 was driven
mainly by trade novations to RBS. The CVA on remaining positions decreased due
to increases in the fair value of the insured assets. The remaining positions
are planned to be novated to RBS in the 3<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super">rd</font> quarter
2009.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 15.95pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The movement in the
CDPC CVA is analysed below:</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div align="left">
              <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                  <tr>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(in
      millions of euros)</font></div>
                    </td>

                    <td colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

      January 2009</font></div>
                    </td>

      through income</font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">)</font></td>
                  </tr>
                  <tr>
                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="89%">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Realised CVA &#8211;
      transfers to RBS</font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                    <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">)</font></td>
                  </tr>

                    <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="89%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">

      currency movement</font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Own
Credit</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The table below
shows the own credit spread adjustments recorded in the income statement during
the period ended 30 June 2009. These own credit spread adjustments arise from
changes in the fair value of financial liabilities designated at fair value
attributable to changes in ABN AMRO&#8217;s own credit risk.</font></div>

            <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
              <div id="FTR">

              <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
                <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Page
37 of 38</font></div>
                <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                  <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
                </div>
              </div>
              <div id="HDR">
                <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
              <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">UNAUDITED</font></font><br><br></div><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The change in fair
value applies to those financial liabilities designated at fair value where ABN
AMRO&#8217;s own credit risk would be considered by market participants and excludes
instruments for which it is established market practice not to include an
entity-specific adjustment for own credit. The fair value change was calculated
based on a yield curve generated from observed external pricing for funding and
quoted CDS spreads. <font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">During the
first half of 2009 ABN AMRO recorded in addition a gain in net trading income of
EUR 41 million on own credit relating to derivative
liabilities.</font></font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
